revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Actiontec MI424WR G.jpg |image1_size = 75px |caption = Wireless Verizon FiOS Router with Gigabit Ethernet (GigE) |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.actiontec.com/214.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Actiontec_MI424WR_rev_G |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Actiontec |model = MI424WR |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = GigE |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = MI424WR |type = wireless router, FiOS modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = LNQMI424WRG |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN5020; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 300 / 400 / 500 / 600 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;JS28F512M29EWH; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T1G164QF-BCE6; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:26:62, 00:26:B8, 00:1F:90 |oui = 00:26:62, 00:26:B8, 00:1F:90
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.1;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.16.14;OpenRG;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 10 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J7 |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MoCA 1.1 |addchip = 8-Kb I2C CMOS Serial EEPROM;Catalyst Semiconductor;24C08WI;;1;,,, USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 4-PLL Clock Generator with SSC;Silicon Labs;SL38000-15AH;;1;,,, MoCA 1.1 controller;Entropic Communications;EN2510-NG1;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Actiontec |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/03/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 0789286807663 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9227; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r26826672- Appears to also be Cavium based] :CPU: [[Cavium]] Networks Octeon CN50XX V0.1 :wifi0: Atheros AR9287 (AR9227 - PCI) :switch: Broadcom BCM53xx *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r26866489-Actiontec-MI424WR-Rev-G-Firmware 00:26:B8 OUI assumed, picture of the label] :Wireless chip may be AR9227
The default SSID may be ''Actiontec''.
The default login password is prompted on 1st use.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
